# The `PPCTargetMachine` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Common code between 32-bit and 64-bit PowerPC targets. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

Common code between 32-bit and 64-bit PowerPC targets.

### unqualifiedInlineAsmVariant() {#a9d738a4c1d6b4897792bdaa7a33006d5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="int llvm::PPCTargetMachine::unqualifiedInlineAsmVariant () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The default variant to use in unqualified <code>asm</code> instructions.

If this returns 0, <code>asm &quot;$(foo$|bar$)&quot;</code> will evaluate to <code>asm &quot;foo&quot;</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppctargetmachine-h/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppctargetmachine-h">PPCTargetMachine.h</a>.
